website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for both its ease of use and its comfortable feel.
pros: Available in a variety of sizes, as well as combo deals
Comes with a carrying case and a plastic tip for guide protection
Easy to mount a reel onto it
cons: Pole can be a little stiff, which can affect casting distance

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this rod and reel. This is perfect for those backpacking trips or just down to the local river. Built really well and worth ever pennie.
customer_reviews.author: LovingMontana

customer_reviews.title: So compact  it fits in my backpack and I don't have to worry about it getting broken
customer_reviews.text: Just got this rod first off it is a beauty fits good in the hand , I love how compact it is . Fits great in my pack that I take its awesome I can pack it in find a spot to fish and pull it out ready to go . It's an awesome rod .
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Convenient light-weight case with collapsible rod and reel combo kit!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleasantly surprised how nice and beautiful the case is and how much it can hold inside! The collapsible rod tip is very well protected inside the case that I feel comfortable in fitting a few more small items in there, making it very convenient for travelling (especially with luggage limitation nowadays) and during long walks to fishing spots.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Rod broke on a 2 lb fish
customer_reviews.text: The reel is good no problems with it. Case is very handy. The telescoping rod broke in two while reeling in a 2LB bass. Had used it 12 times with no problems but broke into two pieces when reeling in a bass.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It broke the first time I used it
customer_reviews.text: I wish I didn’t have to write this... But I finally got around to using it. I tried for 10 minutes and everything worked well and then I put it back together. I barely had any pressure on my line to hook it back to the real so I could put the cover back on it. The tip snapped right off... I’ve owned many poles expensive ones and cheap ones and this has never happened. I’m sure other people have had no issues but for whatever reason my tip snapped right off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! Broken after one day of use!!
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited after receiving this. It looked pretty and my 10 year old aspiring fisherman was ecstatic. Unfortunately, within one DAY of periodic use the segments were irreversibly locked due to pressure of casting and poor design. I watched my son and he was not irresponsible. Unfortunately, the carbon is so thin that attempting to use pliers only scratches the paint, wears it down and had the potential to bend out of shape. So. SO disappointed and surprised after so many reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Confident Joy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It broke on the first day using it, I got small rock fish and it didn’t hold it at all. I can’t believe how week it was. I wanna ask for refund but there is no email I can send message to. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Plussino is the real deal! A quaopeoduct here. I've had my first Plussino rod for over 5 years and still use it to this day, still going strong. I love these rods for travel. I can easily put them in the car when taking my kayak to the lake. I have 4 total (different models) and they are the best telescopic rods I've come by. I've purchased other comparable options that claim to be good, but those are the ones that break. I've never had a Plussino break. They are worth the money. I'd your in the market for a telescopic rod, I highly recommend Plusinno!
customer_reviews.author: Brendon

customer_reviews.title: Great feel and action, Already caught numerous fish.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rod and reel combo for my husband. We go fishing every weekend, since buying this rod and reel combo for my husband I have gone through two rods and reels myself that were a cheaper brand and they did not stand the salt and heavy like this one did. The reel is smooth, drag is top notch, rod is one of the strongest.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true?
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday, I am still skeptical on how long this will last me. But it’s a nice rod, I caught a couple large mouth bass with it in my favorite pond. The rod performed as expected, I don’t know if it can handle any 8+ lb slobs, but it was perfect for small pond fishing. I was able to put it in my fishing pack in my truck and now I have a fishing pole wherever I go. It’s good quality so far, but I’m still skeptical. Seems too good to be true. But I’ve caught fish, and it didn’t break yet after 20 casts. For the money, I’m really not too worried.
customer_reviews.author: Brenden

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and Cheap - Zero Stars - Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Broke on the first use. Slight tension on the 4lb line supplied, not the 10lb it was rated for. Case was also coming apart upon delivery. In my experience, this is a terrible product. Go to Walmart and pay $10 for a more durable product and throw it/give it away when finished. Extremely disappointed. One of the worst purchases I have made. Very disappointing as I was excited about it and saw great reviews. The equipment seemed ok during inspection. Terrible misjudgment on my part and terrible product by the manufacturer. A complete waste of money and excitement thinking this would be worth more than my child’s toy set. (Which has not broken and is working great)
customer_reviews.author: Evitarcul

customer_reviews.title: I feel ripped off
customer_reviews.text: It is indeed lightweight but everything about this package feels cheap, especially the case. I haven't used it yet because I feel confident that it will break into pieces quite rapidly. I wouldn't recommend this product package EXCEPT as a decent backup to your primary fishing pole. Very expensive considering what you get. If the price was $50 I would be happy with the value but at a cost of almost $100 I feel thoroughly ripped off. 2 1/2 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: We Review Products

customer_reviews.title: Not My Cup of Tea?
customer_reviews.text: As reported in a recent YouTube video, it pointed out about the "Drag" on the reel. I agreed with that review, as it being a weak point on the reel. I wanted to discuss this with someone at Plusinno Customer Service but could not connect with their site, with numerous tries (Safari,Google Chrome,Bing)? That was sort of the decision point for myself! If you can't communicate with the manufacture about your issue, what is the point of keeping their product? Sent it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!!!
customer_reviews.text: If portability is what you're looking for, look no where else! The rod is collapsible. I always leave it safely in the carrying case in my trunk and take it out with me whenever I'm in the mood for fishing. Performance-wise, it is pretty sturdy and I catch a lot of fish with it. Although I only do pier fishing, I think it can handle well with medium-sized one. It is pretty lightweight so you can fish for hours without fatigue. Notice that the rod is quite flexible, which is good for casting and saving you from snapping the line. Cosmetic-wise, the whole setup looks really good with eye-catching colorway. I do get compliments from my fellows.
customer_reviews.author: PhucHuynh

customer_reviews.title: Spinning rod combo!
customer_reviews.text: I thought the look and feel would be great for what i was trying to do which was bass fishing.The reel is smooth and it has a great distance. The fish rod is sensative enough you can feel ever little bump.This the best rod and reel I've ever own.
customer_reviews.author: Akram K.

customer_reviews.title: Compact, quality, affordable. Good for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a seasoned fisherman in any capacity, but wanted a nice starting kit that was easy to throw in the car. This telescoping pole fits that need. Comes with a nice case and some starting equipment like lures and hooks. The fishing reel feels and looks great for something entry level. This comes with fishing line that needs to be spooled unto the reel so had to look up some knots and learn something. Overall great to use, quick and easy to collapse and put away. Recommend to others. Maybe ill even eventually catch something that isnt a sunfish.
customer_reviews.author: Artur Shlifer

customer_reviews.title: Great set.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. It is exactly what I was looking for. Looks great, and feels even better. Reel an pole are balanced. The reel has s smooth action. I have already caught some fish on it.
customer_reviews.author: chris avolio

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Balanced
customer_reviews.text: I have been fishing this rod and reel combo for a few weeks now.Very well balanced combo with an exceptionally smooth retrieve.Excellent drag system works perfectly every time.
customer_reviews.author: ronald greene

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good combo. Light and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rod for my boyfriend and he absolutely loved it! I think the rod is very good but the real is amazing. The reel has very smooth casting and we almost never get backlash with it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Outperforms Expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be the same as all the other telescopic rods on Amazon, but it's not. It's way better. High quality rod. All metal eyelets. Doesn't even feel like a telescopic, it feels like a regular bass rod. Lighter and stronger than others I've used. The reel is powerful, smooth, and quiet. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cheap Angler Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Great for visiting grandparents!
customer_reviews.text: My parents live near a lake, and my daughter likes to go fishing when we visit. When they said they'd misplaced their tackle box, I ordered this one with the telescoping pole for travel as well. It comes with a lot of different types of lures, and they had fun experimenting with what worked best. The pole was sturdy, and stayed extended (or small). It's light weight enough for kids learning to fish, but sturdy enough for an all around lake pole.
customer_reviews.author: Smurphette

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Travel Setup
customer_reviews.text: This fishing rod is amazing! I bought it to be a portable setup to keep in my car and it works so well. I love the case that came with it and the quality of the rod and reel are great! Showing some friends of mine and they were very impressed with the quality for the money. If you're just getting into fishing, this setup is a great way to get your own setup without spending a lot of money. It is also much better than the $50 combos you find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great travel fishing rod
customer_reviews.text: This rod works great if you love to hike and backpack. It's fits perfectly in my hiking pack and it is easy to assemble to start fishing. It is durable and also looks sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Travel Rod
customer_reviews.text: Love the rod! It is an awesome addition to my collection and collapses to the perfect size that I can take anywhere. It is very strong even though there is a lot of moving parts. It feels like a very quality product and the reel that came with it is very smooth as well!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Rod Reel Combo!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Plusinno 6.8 Telescopic Fishing Pole - Spinning Reel combo. I work on the road and having a reliable compact combo is worth its weight in gold. The rod quickly and easily extends allowing for minimum set up time. The rod offers a responsive medium action great for bass or pan fish. The reel is made from metal and solid sturdy plastics. The reel is very smooth and rotates effortlessly without excessive vibration. The combo is perfect for the traveling fishing enthusiast
customer_reviews.author: Brayden

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Writing my first Amazon review. I am not a fishing guy. After doing some research on internet I was looking for similar product. It’s a good product nice durable and compact with a kit bag. Few of my friends wanted to buy it too when they saw me doing fishing with it. The biggest things for me was that I can carry it in my back pack. Buying this kit gave we what I need for fishing. I think it would be nice to have guided colored lines on the rod to keep rod eyes straight while extending. Please do your research for what you are looking. I hope my review wasn’t confusing.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable for a Telescoping Rod.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this Overall nice fishing rod. The telescoping rod is very light and fits easily into my car. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: vitaliy

customer_reviews.title: Compact and great quality pole, reel combo!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these Plusinno Rod and Reel Combo! The rod is great quality! The reel is also great! It’s a great fishing rod for the price. The reel is very well and great quality. Rod and Reel is perfect for traveling in my fishing backpack. No more 2piece poles loaded into my car. I love how these poles collapse and how well they are made. Also, the poles look really cool!
customer_reviews.author: Surachat O’Neal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pole works great
customer_reviews.text: It works like it says it should I had a problem with the end pice not retracting you need to use the pole a lot for it to work right
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy to use and great value.
customer_reviews.text: This fishing Pole is awesome, Although I wish I didn't suck at fishing. It would be even more amazing if it came with the magical ability of being able to attract fish. I caught a plastic bag and feel proud that I did not go home empty handed.
customer_reviews.author: MoFugga

customer_reviews.title: Great for backpacking
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome rod and reel for hikers. Very smooth and drag is easy to adjust. Caught 10 white crappie first day out with it on a hike.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Decent but snapped too soon
customer_reviews.text: I've had this rod for about 2 months, and have caught some solid fish on it. It is great for traveling I can put it in my backpack and bike to my fishing spots with it. The feel on the rod is not great but that's to be expected with a telescopic rod. Yesterday I hooked onto a nice fighting mangrove snapper. I was able to land him after a nice fight, however the top third of the rod broke off. It still works but the feel on it is even worse. I'm a little disappointed that it did not hold up longer, but it is still good for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: David Neifeld

customer_reviews.title: light weight and portable but broke after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: It was working smooth for 1 week and the reel start to feel heavy and wont reel smoother than it use to. It nice and portable light weight but the pole doesnt stay in place. When i put the new line it only roll on bottom side and wont cover the whole spool and creates a nest. The case that came start to fall apart, the glue inside that put the pockets together gave up. I wish i can love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Allen E.

customer_reviews.title: It's good quality, cheap, and easy to stow
customer_reviews.text: It's good quality rod, and it's my first rod! I love it. I have only gone bass fishing. I would say the directions need to be better. That's to say - it didn't come with any. I am a complete novice - I have no idea how to put the reel on the rod. I had to spend 5-10 minutes finding videos on how to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: Dad has already opened his father's day gift and is using it. He said it was best he's ever had... Looks great, and feels even better.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Willems

customer_reviews.title: My pole broke and my GF's reel broke during first outting with these poles
customer_reviews.text: These are not high quality. I am an experienced fisherman and treat my gear well. My pole broke on maybe the 10th cast and my girlfriends reel broke around the same time. Absolute garbage for what they cost. these should be $30 dollar rods for this kind of crap quality and even then I would not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Pfeilsticker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grab and go
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this rod, it out performed my buddies ugly stik combo. The reel was buttery smooth. You probably have less feel than a traditional rod, however it makes it up in convenience. I just keep this bad boy in my trunk ready to go at any time. Plus it takes up minimal space whereas a two piece rod takes up way more space. My buddy who had the ugly stik actually bought one of these after using it stating "i wish i got this instead".
customer_reviews.author: Manbearpig

customer_reviews.title: This rod is nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pole for my husband as a gift. he was so happy to have gotten this pole! The rod has really great sensitivity and surprising strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Housewright

customer_reviews.title: Highly advised to NOT purchase this item.
customer_reviews.text: With all that's going on, I have not been able to go fishing as frequently as I want to. I purchased this rod as a replacement for one of my older rods and was enticed by the portability, which was a mistake. The first red flag was when one of the shafts would not retract, I knew I should have sent it back immediately. First catch caused the rod itself to snap (this was in a pond, nothing too big in there.) Save yourself the headache and continue browsing for non-telescopic fishing rods, this will just be a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product for the price took just a few minutes to tune up for long casting! Great rod and reel for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: humberto

customer_reviews.title: Brittle rod *updated*
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the rod for a couple months now and have really liked how compact it is. Though I’m not sure if it was a manufacturer defect or not, but I got snagged in the weeds and rod snapped like a twig. Looking into a replacement. I’d like to get another but not sure if I should press my luck. Update 8/26/2019: I updated my ratings to 4-stars based on customer service. I contacted their customer service and the seller was very courteous and responsive. I received a refund for my rod. I will likely try and get a similar rod from them again in hopes that the issue was just that one rod.
customer_reviews.author: Ramosgv

customer_reviews.title: Great pole!
customer_reviews.text: Great rod/reel combo. Took this on a 4 backpacking trip, stood up great to a lot of use. What is really nice is the available lengths for this rig, it is longer than other collapsable poles out there. And yes, I did Catch a lot of fish (Brook and Cutthroat Trout). When I got home I ordered a few more as Christmas presents for the grandsons.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: really great set.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson-in-law. stationed in Florida this is so handy he can keep it in his truck.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Sapaugh

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at first
customer_reviews.text: With the lack of good reviews and solid feedback on these rods it was really hard to make a choice on one of these but I bought this one and I’m really glad I did. This rod and real combo are amazing. It’s convenient and functional to say the least. The reel is very smooth and the rod is solid. I’ve already ordered a second one. If you are hesitating on purchasing one don’t. Buy this one you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: everything about it I’ll give it 100% thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I would add a picture but I’m outside and it’s in. I just want to say that I have never liked the telescopic rods but when it comes to this brand over the summer I’ve used them more than I have my okuma trios. I highly recommend this rod and reel Especially if you need to save space it’s not built cheap everything about it I’ll give it 100% thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Broadway

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Light Durable, This Rod and Reel Combo will Fish!
customer_reviews.text: I searched all over for a Rod and Reel combo I could take in a back pack while ridding my bike to the lake. Of all the reel and rod combos the Plusinno checked all the boxes. Right price, great extension, and best of all when I received the combo, a Reel with smooth action high end design, and very well manufactured. It was a pleasant surprise. The telescoping rod does have a slight sticking point when collapsing the last small segment. However after a couple of times extending the rod I able to determine the right procedure to collapse the last segment without a problem
customer_reviews.author: La Vida Loca

customer_reviews.title: Faulty reel out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: The reel failed after about 30 second of showing my wife the neat switch for changing from left to right hand reeling. I bought this as a replacement for my Ancheer telescoping rod and reel, which I loved, but broke... The pole feels similar but I'm going to throw the reel away and get what I want from Cabela's
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This combo is a great beginner fishing rod. I's nice looking but most importantly really resistable.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: What a great rod and reel combo! Even the little tackle is decent. Took backpacking in Northern Idaho, and proceeded to catch 2 perch, a bluegill, and a bass. The only thing I changed out was the fishing line ( came with 3#, I installed 8#). The rod handle is a bit small, but definitely got used to it.
customer_reviews.author: PNW Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great rod and reel
customer_reviews.text: I took the reel to Cabela's to have the line put on it. The guy who put the line on it was very impressed with the quality of the reel. It works great and the case that it comes in is large enough to carry everything I need for a day fishing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Barker

customer_reviews.title: good compact rod and reel
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the overall product. The reel has been very good for all types of fishing, saltwater and fresh. I have used it in ponds, rivers, and the ocean. I was initially happy with the rod, but on a recent trip fishing on the Oregon coast, I snapped the rod when I got snagged on some kelp. I gave it one big jerk to free the lure, and the rod snapped...which was a big surprise to me, seeing as I only had on 8lb test. Anyways, the reel is still good.
customer_reviews.author: David R. King

customer_reviews.title: Carrying Case Doesn't Fit After Installing Reel
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this product yet but it seems like a decent pole. The telescoping feature saves a lot of space and makes it way less awkward to carry. After I lined the reel I have not found a way to fit it back in it's original carrying case. That does make it hard to fit into a hiking bag, but its still easier than having a full sized pole catching on every tree.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Cox

customer_reviews.title: Functional and a good value!
customer_reviews.text: Decent rod with a good reel but with an excellent price. I but braid line on it and took it out on the kayak. It opened and closed smoothly. Collapses and opens with easy. I bought two and keep one in my car at all times in case I see a spot to stop at. I used two keep a spare reel in my kayak crate but the combo allows me to keep a backup rod and reel in the crate.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: Great combo and price!
customer_reviews.text: Great rod and real! I bought 2 and the included case was perfect for packing. Used the rods in Texas for surf fishing which had never done before. The rods worked great for whiting, even 2 at a time! Was throwing 3 oz Sputnik’s into the surf with these rods and they handled the huge weight just fine. Real worked fine no problems with it. I was pretty surprised how well the rods opened and closed, never slipped out of the inner rods always tight but easy enough to break down. No problems with breaking rod tips even being a novice at surf fishing. Buy it!!!’
customer_reviews.author: Aclarc56

customer_reviews.title: Good strength to this rod
customer_reviews.text: The strength of this rod is great. I was able to land a 55 inch lake sturgeon on it. The feel of this rod is not as good as a cork handled rod but it would work well as a travel rod. The tip is pretty sensitive on the 7ft 6 version of the rod that I have
customer_reviews.author: Hans Klopp

customer_reviews.title: Wow.  Very very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I have been fishing for nearly 40 years. I bought this combo to begin fishing with our kids here. Wow. The quality is top notch. I wish there was a video of our "unboxing" here at the house. The reel is super quality in weight and smooth action. There is a drag setting on the reel and the motion is smooth and quality. Highly recommend. And breaks down to about 18 inches long.
customer_reviews.author: Exador

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and fun.
customer_reviews.text: I have had one 5 months and I love it. I keep it my car all the time. The reel did need to be oiled when I first got it though. The rod expands easily and has a decent amount of sensitivity to considering it is a collapsible. I bought another to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough for sockeye salmon - both the rod and the reel
customer_reviews.text: This telescoping rod with reel combo did just what I wanted. Easy to pack in my luggage, heavy enough for salt water fishing (I was catching 5+ pound salmon in a swift running river). I plan to use it for salt water fishing at the Carolina coast.
customer_reviews.author: B. L,

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner or travel rod
customer_reviews.text: First rod/reel I've purchased as I am just getting into fishing and it has served me as well as I could ask for. Not a bad price point. Storage space was a concern for me, so this really won me over. Biggest fish I caught so far was a 3 foot catfish and the pole held up, which was one of my largest concerns with it being collapsible and all. I'd recommend this for anyone just starting out fishing or anyone looking for an affordable travel rod that works well. For the beginners, you'll have to tie your own line on, but I found that it helped me avoid or resolve tangles now that I've had to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Nice travel rod and reel and a good value
customer_reviews.text: I just received the product today and ws quick to unbox it. The reel is a quality 12 ball bearing 30 size reel that is appropriate for most lake, river and inshore fishing. The rod I got was the 8 foot option. The telescoping collapses to about 15 inches. When it expands, the joints are nice and tight. Can't wait to take it fishing. I recommend this product for personal use, or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable fishing reel
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, relatively light weight, only slightly heavier than my one piece fishing rod , but much more compact for travel and stow away. Used a few times now, reel is smooth, so far no rust yet. Highly recommend for weekend casual fishing.
customer_reviews.author: S.N.

customer_reviews.title: This is the smoothest set up that I own!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I bought this pole. It's the most reliable and smoothest reel on the water. Whether you are inshore fishing, Pond fishing, lake fishing. It's well built sturdy combos.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Crap! Except for the handle.
customer_reviews.text: It super portable and convenient that way, but once I protrude them they tend to stuck. The reel gets stuck and needs a good beating or jerking. I am back to ugly stick and Shakespeare again. I am giving it 2 starts for it's super comfy handle. Ain't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Henok.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: It’s Nice and compact assembles real easy work great did what I needed to do caught some fish
customer_reviews.author: thomas hardy

customer_reviews.title: Travel friendly rod & reel combo!
customer_reviews.text: Great rod/reel combo to go on that lunch time fishing adventure. The reel is great for fresh and saltwater because it has a stainless steel housing. The rod is light weight and extends to 7.87 feet, which gives me further casting power. Testing out the reel I caught a large fresh water bass without a struggle. Great product for the price and very portable. No more rods hanging out of my window. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: This rod has been awesome! It is very lightweight and portable while being sturdy to get a better hookset. We have caught a yellow perch on it and we take it every time we go fishing. The compact design lets you fit it in the smallest of areas, and the included case makes it easy to carry around and store it. Overall, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: REMEMBER to keep tightening the nut that holds the handle in. As others have said it does work loose. I'm going to explore a sticky coat or something for it. Works well, catches fish, didn't corrode first weekend in salt water.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent.

customer_reviews.title: This rod feels like a light saber!
customer_reviews.text: This rod feels like a a light saber in my padawan hands!....and yes. I've been sparring against my wife's fortune plant. I've been waiting for you, fish. We meet again, at last. The circle is now complete. When I met you I was but the learner. Now, *I* am the master.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Hermogenes

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant about the low price but this is a solid setup. The rod and reel and sturdy and it spins cleanly. The bag is goo d quality and includes velcro and sacks to keep the accessories in place. I'll likely buy a second one for my wife for our RV.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, quality item
customer_reviews.text: Nice rod and very well packaged. My husband loved this.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, easily breakable
customer_reviews.text: I had the rod for maybe less then a month and it broke within use while fishing. The keyhole snapped off making the line snap each time as a cast was made. Do not recommend this pole unless you like breaking poles quick and wasting money.
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight pack-able rod and reel combo!
customer_reviews.text: Great Lightweight pack-able rod and reel combo, tested surf fishing at Folly Beach S.C. Rod and reel handled well and was responsive, although it might be more conducive to the gulf or bayside fishing as the current does add to the amount of weight you need to keep your bait stationary in that type of current...and does put a little extra strain and stress on this rig. But it did produce fish, caught pompano and black drum on it while at Folly Beach. perfect for travelers!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Shehan

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: Placinno retractable fushing rod. I'm a fisherman but needed something to carry in my motorcycle. This pole is perfect. It's made of strong nice looking products. It's heavy duty and feels great. But heavy enough to fish a jig or plastic worm but perfect for most lures.
customer_reviews.author: C Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great product can’t complain.
customer_reviews.text: I got the 8ft pole alone for my uncles birthday. It’s light weight, seems sturdy, reels smooth and casts smooth. I paired it up with 25lbs braid and so far no issues. Can’t wait for more testing and will update if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Very portable pole, just not the strongest..
customer_reviews.text: I've fished since I was about 6. Since my oldest (will be 6) was ready to go, he wanted matching poles to go fishing together. We loved the collapsible poles and they are very light-weight and portable! We've only been to our local fishing hole, nothing big (probably 3 lbs max, so no real strain). After several times of use, my pole snapped while casting. Not sure if it was a defect during manufacturing, but never had that happen before? So just be leary purchasing this pole.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lightweight and fun
customer_reviews.text: The day was good, could see right into the water and I take out this pole and my god did I feel like a surgeon in the lake. Smooth light and fast . Has everything I could want and to top it all it fits right in my backpack for easy transport
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fishing rod for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Execllent fishing rod. I bought two from Plusinno. This is the black one. Very compact and strong. The reel is so smooth with 12 ball bearings. Easy to ise and perfect for beginners. I bought the pink lady's one for my gf. I store them semi retracted. Caught some fish =).
customer_reviews.author: Cus

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rod and reel for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love how portable this thing is, now I can fit my entire kit in a small bag and keep it with me at all times. You never know when you might have to battle a fish and you don't want to be caught without your weapon.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Don't be surprised if the pole breaks at a joint
customer_reviews.text: First time using the pole. Got snagged on something in the water and trying to break the line free, 10lb line, the pole snapped right at a joint. Had the 7' version of this combo. Highly frustrated that the return window is closed and now I am stuck with a broken pole.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Bought as Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend as a Christmas gift. He actually researched and pucked it out. Plans on using it for a trip to Minnesota this Summer. He is happy with it so far but hasn't used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: buzzybell

customer_reviews.title: Handle wont stay tight
customer_reviews.text: I liked the plusinno rod and reel. The problem i had was that the bolt that holds the handle on wont stay tight and i had to keep tightening it after a couple casts. Second time i used it the bolt came out after 5 minutes of fishing and fell in the lake which pretty much makes it useless now because the handle wont stay on. Would have gave it a better review if ithe bolt would stay tight.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Muncy

customer_reviews.title: Just one issue
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars, but I’ve experienced issues when reeling fish. Overall there is no issue with the rod, it’s very durable. However when it comes to reeling a 5lb bass, the handle will begin to fold and it’s really annoying. The folding handle is very convenient for storage purposes but I think it needs to be improved for toughness
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: Telescopic Rod!!!!!! Best value for your $$$.
customer_reviews.text: The Telescopic fishing rod was awesome. I can carry it anywhere! Very convenient. Very sturdy and so far it working really well for me. I bought the whole kit.. Good purchase on my side..
customer_reviews.author: Rubberducky

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fishing rod, hope it holds up
customer_reviews.text: Excellent initial quality but I only used it once for trout fishing. If it holds up I would heartily recommend it as a traveling fishing rod. Took it through airport security twice and the second time I was asked to unpack it so next time I would take it out of the luggage for a quick inspection if needed.
customer_reviews.author: MarcM

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the case the two velcro tabs that holds the rod in place that is glued to the cover came off. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Cue

customer_reviews.title: Flexible and durable, inexpensive and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome fishing rod! I have used it three times now and I absolutely love it. It is super convenient to carry and so far very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Cope

customer_reviews.title: Warranty of this item
customer_reviews.text: What is the warranty on this item? This Rod is great until strain is put on it and because it has joints they are the weak pressure points and mine BROKE under 15 to 25 lbs of pressure and bending .
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: This thing is total garbage
customer_reviews.text: Piece of chinese plastic flimsy crap- Handle constantly came loose (you have to tighten all the flimsy parts constantly, or they fall off--, eventually falling unexpectedly into the water, making this worthless thing, completely worthless.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sweet
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this pole is it is very compact. This pole is sturdy. I dont honestly feel like I'm fishing with a cheap piece of crap. The only negative is that there isnt a way to lock the pole down when its folded so it sorta moves a bit. Once I strung it up that seemed to not be much of an issue. Took me a minute to figure out where to hook it and I found the hole at the bottom of the pole.
customer_reviews.author: Atlas

customer_reviews.title: Great value! (updated review+picture)
customer_reviews.text: I got to take my new rod/reel combo out to fish for some reluctant winter-time Texas bass. The rod performed wonderfully well. I missed a few fish early on, but concluded that it was user error and/or line choice. Overall, the rod performed very well. I think the largest one I caught that day was nearly 3lbs, no issues with the product. I'll be taking this with me everywhere now.
customer_reviews.author: rickrowe

customer_reviews.title: Casual Fisherman
customer_reviews.text: I'm a very casual fisher and this was so easy to set up and use. It worked very well and incredibly convenient to fold up and throw in the case in my car. Quality feels great too. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anders

customer_reviews.title: Does not reel properly.
customer_reviews.text: The rod itself is nice but the reel has issues. Does not reel in properly and tangles. Very frustrating. I have used open reels all my life. This one comes with challenges.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Greenleaf

customer_reviews.title: Reel not spinning properly
customer_reviews.text: The reel doesn’t spin properly, gets tough to spin when it gets near the bottom; like it is rubbing on something. Mood kill, didn’t open the package until I was at the lake. Happy I was just kayaking that day would have been really upset if I took it backpacking carrying it for miles just for it to be dead weight. Didn’t have time to test at home bc I had my husband pickup the mail before picking me up from work so we could have more time outdoors. Will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Moll

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: This rod and reel combo is nice so far which works great and has a great performance, really smooth!! It is better than I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jose J. Muniz

customer_reviews.title: works awsome...
customer_reviews.text: This pole is great works good small compact easy to use.took it to big bear lake.. I do recomend to get a stronger line for the reel but other than that it works....
customer_reviews.author: john baccarella

customer_reviews.title: Durable and works well.
customer_reviews.text: I took mine to Colorado, Ohio and north Georgia. Does a great job. But the reel handle flew off into the water. So I need a new handle now. But it’s a great travel pole and one to pack in the car.
customer_reviews.author: William Durham

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Rod,looking forward to using it in my fishing trip.
customer_reviews.text: Rod is built well,guides are strong. Cant wait to see its performance. Will definitely be purchasing again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Spanky Flint

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Way better than expected! Bought one for my brother as a Christmas gift, after he opened it and we got it out for its first use. This thing is awesome I will definitely be buying more, easy to use very sturdy the reel is even super smooth, this is a must have for your car or bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy another!
customer_reviews.text: Nice rod and reel. Tips a little light but is great for hoofing a creek. Caught a couple 2lb. Small mouth with the line provided no wind knots didn't uncoil off the reel and the hard had plenty of room to add tackle!
customer_reviews.author: lauren marie reed

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Rod
customer_reviews.text: Great rod for on the go, keep it in my back pack in my car or take it when I go hiking/camping. Collapses well, watch your fingers if you got a hook on it still. reel is nice and smooth, very lightweight and comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: PLUSINNO Fishing Rod and Reel Combos - Carbon Fiber Telescopic Fishing Pole - Spinning Reel 12 +1 Shielded Bearings Stainless Steel BB
feature_bullets: 🎣 Warm Prompt: Fishing rod(5.91FT)+reel(No Lures & Line) Include 1 Fishing Rod +1 Fishing Reel.

🎣 PLUSINNO Telescopic Fishing Rod are constructed with High Density 24-Ton Carbon Fiber reinforced with Fiberglass Composite for power,elasticity and durability; The Welded Stainless Steel Guides with Ceramic Inserts for superior casting distance and accuracy while dissipating heat more efficiently which delivers excellent durability with monofilament, fluorocarbon and braided lines; The Exquisite Reel Seat Is Made of Corrosion Resistant CNC Machined Aluminum for a solid base and all-day.

🎣 HA 3000 Fishing Reel With CNC Machine Cut Collapsible Handle, Left / Right Interchangeable The Rod Import Adjustable Full Metal Screw Reel Seat,12+1 Corrosion Resistant Smooth Ball Bearings,Line capacity: mm/M 0.20/240 0.25/200 0.30/140, Gear ratio: 5.2:1.

🎣 Light Weight and Portable, Easily Fits in Car Trunk, Boat or Backpack. Fishing Rod and Reel Combos Allow You To Travel To Your Favorite Fishing Spot and Enjoy Fishing Whenever and Wherever You Want.
🎣 It's the best gift to send father, son, husband, fiancé, boyfriend for the upcoming Christmas. Want to buy single rod or single reel? Please search the ASIN: B07Y2ZDVWD or B07YFP8KV3.
